content.text:
# List of Important Bird Areas in the United Kingdom

The following is a list of Important Bird Areas in the United Kingdom:
England
* Bodmin Moor, Cornwall
* Duddon Estuary, Cumbria
* Leighton Moss RSPB reserve, Lancashire
Scotland
